title: Pride and Prejudice (CRS122)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Jesse Chappe first shared on the podcast in October of 2014 about bigotry in an unexpected place.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jessie Chappe, Kevin Allison)
